Package com.csis3275.Group404Project.controller

Class BootController

java.lang.Object
com.csis3275.Group404Project.controller.BootController
@Controller
public class BootController
extends java.lang.Object
The boot controller is the controller that loads models into the jsps as well as handle all routes when a user is clicking around a page.

      @PostMapping("/createExpense") public java.lang.String createExpense​(@ModelAttribute("Expense") Expense createExpense, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Grabs all the data that was entered into the form and create a new expense. This expense is then added to the database.
      Returns:

    • createUser

      @GetMapping("/createUser") public java.lang.String createUser()
      Redirects user to be able to either create a new user if they're an admin or show an error otherwise.
      Returns:
      If the user return is an admin, redirect to create a user or forbidden if not.

    • submitPassword

      @PostMapping("/submitPassword") public java.lang.String submitPassword​(@RequestParam java.lang.String oldPassword, @RequestParam java.lang.String newPassword, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Checks to see if the old password matches the one inputed. If so, update it in the database, otherwise throw an error.
      Parameters:
      oldPassword - Password to be updated.
      newPassword - Password that replaces old pasword.
      Returns:
      The change password page.

    • filterExpense

      @GetMapping("/filterExpense") public java.lang.String filterExpense​(@RequestParam(required=true) java.lang.String expenseType, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Shows a filtered list of expenses based on the category selected.
      Returns:
      Redirects to home page.
